revised_title: Ecological Effects of Acid Deposition on Soil-Water Interactions
tldr: The article discusses the ecological effects of deposited sulfur and nitrogen compounds on soil-water interactions. It explains the processes involved in cation exchange reactions and the impact of acid deposition on soil and water composition. The author suggests that detailed soil-water investigations are necessary to understand the effects of acid deposition on lake and stream water composition.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Soil Chemistry
